attributes.action: removing the abuser from the children
attributes.additional_details:
Remove the abuser from children ASAP when sex abuse has been reported.

After reporting child sex abuse the abuser must be removed from the children ASAP so no influence/fear can be put on the children when the investigation is in progress.

After I reported child sex abuse in 2012 to social services/police there was no statement taken from me, they never removed the abuser away from the children, Data protection Act went out the window,  basically nothing was done. the whole case was a complete shambles
